Labels: good-first-project

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
I would say it's still irrelevant :stuck_out_tongue:

It's surely at least good for the counterexamples folder?

I think it would be interesting to generate a collection of topological spaces and proofs that they do or don't satisfy various predicates that we have on topological spaces; then you could imagine expanding slim_check to look for counterexamples in this domain too.
Of course now we have to write "Counterexamples in condensed sets"...
